templateSubject.value: FINAL NOTICE - Scholar Consent Form Signature

html.value:
Dear {{firstName}} {{lastName}},

 

Your Scholar Consent Form is still OUTSTANDING for {{programName}} and should be completed as soon as possible.

If you accept your appointment, your Acceptance package and your payment of programming fees must be received by the {specified Deadline Date}  at 11:50pm PST. If you do not accept, you will have to relinquish your seat to an applicant on our WaitList.

 

Sent on behalf of the LEAD Review Team
